text: I find myself having this sort of pattern over and over:

code:
variable = ""
try:
    variable = ... do some file loading stuff ...
except:
    variable = ""

text: Is there any way to condense this into a single expression?
Like with if-else statements you can turn:

code:
variable = ""
if something:
    variable = somethingelse
else:
    variable = ""

text: Is there any equivalent thing for try-catch?
